overview: Breathtaking film of romantic adventure, intrigue & sensuality featuring one of the hottest stars of the nineties, Fabio. An Anthology film featuing 3 romantic shorts: Conquest of the Viking, The Pirate Rogue & Dream Lover. From the mind of Marilyn Campbell, award-winning bestselling author of many romance & suspense novels.
tagline: Starring in the first romance VideoNovel
title: Fabio: A Time For Romance
